items.title: U.S. sends aircraft carrier to South America in major escalation of military firepower

items.title: DOJ hires immigration judges after months of layoffs
items.description: Judges will soon take the bench across 16 states, the Justice Department said. These include courts that saw the biggest losses of judges this year.

items.title: Pakistan bans hard-line Islamist party known for its fierce anti-blasphemy stance
items.description: Pakistan banned a hard-line Islamist party on Thursday, more than a week after heated clashes with police that left at least five people dead.

items.description: The sanctions sharply escalate tensions with the leftist leader of a country that has traditionally been one of the closest U.S. allies in South Ameri...

items.title: Coffee-driven deforestation is making it harder to grow coffee, watchdog group says
items.description: In Brazil's coffee-producing areas, more than 42,000 square miles of forest have disappeared over about two decades, says Coffee Watch. Deforestation ...
